description: Northern Cyprus has declared a curfew between 9 p.m. to 6 a.m. starting March 31. The curfew will be effective until April 10. description: On the March 5, 2020 the TRNC Authorities imposed an external border restriction. Third country nationals who will travel to the TRNC from China, Iran, Iraq, South Korea and Italy, which are considered as high risk countries in terms of COVID-19, will not be admitted to the TRNC from the land, sea and air border gates until further notice. UPDATE: Originally, travellers from specific countries were denied entry (apart from TRNC citizens, their spouses and children). This entry ban got extended to third-citizens from all countries.
date_end_spec: The policy has a clear end date
type_sub_cat: Visa restrictions (e.g. suspend issuance of visa)
target_geog_level: One or more countries, but not all countries
compliance: Mandatory with Exceptions (Please list exceptions in the text entry)
